snippet.title: The Most Terrible Time Of The Year (Trailer) #indie #horrorgaming #christmas #game #gamedev
snippet.description:
A short Christmas horror game, made in 5 days. Delve into a chilling winter night where the serene essence of Christmas turns into a haunting ordeal. 

Wander through an eerie, dimly lit house adorned with festive decorations but harboring ominous presences. Collect fifty scattered Christmas gifts to dispel an encroaching malevolence. However, beware - every gift gathered summons malevolent forces, intensifying their pursuit. 

Navigate the unsettling halls, racing against time and the growing wrath of these entities. Can you gather the gifts and escape before these malevolent forces seize you in this macabre Yuletide nightmare?

DOWNLOAD AND PLAY THE GAME HERE:
https://williamjacobp.itch.io/the-most-terrible-time-of-the-year
https://gamejolt.com/games/the-most-terrible-time-of-the-year/863676
